oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Trends 12 - Newsletter for Organic farming and food development in China
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sternfeld, Eva
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: China
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: ORGANIC TRENDS aims to promote environmentally friendly and healthy food production and processing. Offering a forum for producers, distributors, retailers, consumers as well as academicians, it reports on recent trends in organic farming and food development and provides consumer information. Contributions are welcome!
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Sternfeld, Eva (2008) Organic Trends 12 - Newsletter for Organic farming and food development in China. Organic Trends - Newsletter for Organic farming and food development in China, 12 (12), pp. 1-12. [Unpublished]
